definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: You serve as an executive at state-owned enterprises in steel and communications.
sentences.chinese: 你在分管鋼鐵和通信的國企擔當主管人員。

sentences.english: Having executives and consultants qualified to provide consulting services on MWFN.
sentences.chinese: 有具備涉外婚姻諮詢服務資格的主管人員和諮詢員。

sentences.english: The associate should verify that charge errors are corrected in subsequent monthly statements.
sentences.chinese: 主管人員應確認的錯誤糾正在隨後的月結單。

sentences.english: The new salary scale only refers to company managers and directors.
sentences.chinese: 新的工資級別標準只適用於公司經理和主管人員。

sentences.english: Those CXOs and other potential users across the enterprise are professionals from other arenas. They like simple.
sentences.chinese: 但是漸漸的，你又想爲主管人員和企業市場提供服務。

sentences.english: He pledged tough penalties on corporations and chief officers who falsify accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他揚言將嚴懲作假帳的企業和主管人員。

definition: to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
